name: Poha
steps: Rinse poha in water 1–2 times, drain, sprinkle little salt and sugar, keep aside.
Heat oil, fry peanuts till crisp, keep aside.
In the same oil, add mustard seeds, curry leaves, chopped onion, green chili, turmeric.
Add soaked poha, mix gently, cook 2–3 min on low flame.
Add fried peanuts, lemon juice, chopped coriander, mix.
Serve hot with sev or grated coconut.

name: Misal Pav
steps: Cook sprouts, make spicy curry, serve with pav.

name: Mutton Rassa
steps: Cook mutton with spices to make spicy curry.

name: Puran Poli
steps: Make stuffing with dal & jaggery, roll into poli.

name: Ukdiche Modak
steps: Make rice dough, fill with coconut-jaggery, steam.
